body_html: My apologies, I didn't make it clear, what we usually do is we only normalize if the weight column is > some threshold, i.e., if column norm > threshold, normalize, else do noop. so I dont think that Op will help, or am I mistaken?

body: My apologies, I didn't make it clear, what we usually do is we only normalize if the weight column is > some threshold, i.e., if column norm > threshold, normalize, else do noop. so I dont think that Op will help, or am I mistaken?
